item.title: Remove .DS_Store tracking in all Git repositories
item.author: kourtneylee1611@gmail.com (Kourtney Lee)
item.description: Every time a new folder is created and files are added in macOS, a .DS_Store file is generated within that folder. This results in numerous .DS_Store files scattered across macOS, and it’s quite annoying to add **/.DS_Store to every .gitignore file each time a new Git repository is created. Therefore, I found a method to prevent .DS_Store files from being tracked in all Git repositories.
